markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Catfolk](/Traits.aspx?ID=211)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 266 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

A creature with this trait is a member of the [catfolk](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=17) ancestry. Catfolk are [humanoids](/Traits.aspx?ID=91) with feline features. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by catfolk. An item with this trait is created and used by catfolk.
name: Catfolk
